abstract: Police officers in Egypt begin nationwide strike, demanding better salaries and purging of former government officials from senior security posts.
snippet: About 12,000 of Egypt’s 350,000 police officers are demanding better salaries and a purge of former government officials from senior security posts.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: About 12,000 of Egypt’s 350,000 police officers are demanding better salaries and a purge of former government officials from senior security posts.

headline.main: Egypt: Police Officers Go on Strike
